metadata.Title: CVE-2018-20149 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: In WordPress before 4.9.9 and 5.x before 5.0.1, when the Apache HTTP Serveris used, authors could upload crafted files that bypass intended MIME typerestrictions, leading to XSS, as demonstrated by a .jpg file without JPEGdata.

criterions.comment: wordpress: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
